name: Thison’s Creation #5 “ THE DEVIL IS IN THE DETAILS ”
description:
This is an artwork of a devil mask used in a powerful Sri Lankan exorcism called “ Sanni Yakkuma”. Exorcists wear these devil masks & dance to traditional music to ward off evil demons that cause diseases by possessing their victims. The demon portrayed in this illustration is believed to have been born from a curse by the wrongdoing of an ancient king in Sri Lanka. According to folklore, the demon went on to kill the king and destroy his kingdom. Later, the demon was tamed by the Lord Buddha and banished to the spirit world before causing more destruction. 

Original concept and digital illustration by Thison Nayanake from Ceylon Metaverse. Copyright ownership is granted to token holders. Collectors can tag us on Twitter @CeylonMetaverse and/ or message us so we can grant you a letter of authenticity.
